info.title: Spice API V2
info.description:
This API was developped to interract with webssites Spice. The service is available on the domain that will be given to you (example: api.jetsetrdv.com).

***********************
*** IMPORTANT ***
***********************
The use of API is possible only if you enter an API KEY, for further information please look at Annex 4 - Use of API for developpers.
***********************

Authentication :
To use api_key and pass correctly, you need to send this informations directly on the header of the call (Not in GET or POST) :
Hearder : Authorization: Basic API_KEY:PASSWORD
Please take care that the password is not required on every call but only when you call API Server To Server (function with ***). The password will refused if you call API directly with Ajax.

Authentication for AJAX Call :
When you function with ajax_api (at the place of index_api), you need to send the API_KEY directly in GET (or POST) of the function and NOT in Header !


ANNEX :
1) How to display photos of album ?
The Array containing all picture of the member is return by the function "user" at the index "tab_photo".
This array have some key which are the different format of the picture (sqsmall, sqmiddle, real_size), and the value of this keys are the url of the picture.

2) How to display photo main ?
In the array containing all pictures of the member, you can find the index "main_photo" with informations about the main picture. The format is the same like on Annex 1)

3) Different Actions of Website Activities :
- "con" : A contact (or a friend) was connected.
- "visite" : a member has visited the profil of the connected user.
- "vote" : a member has voted for one picture of the connected user.
- "modif" : a contact (or a friend) has modified his profil.
- "add_tof" : a contact (or a friend) has added pictures on his profil.

4) Use of API for developpers
To use the API, we need replace the domain by the domain that we gave to you !
You need obsolutely add into the URL, the Requiered parameter "api_key" (This parameter si given to you like the good Domain to use)

5) CGU / CGU / Term Of Use
To print Term of Use of the Website (or the Application), you need use the next link :
https://api.jetsetrdv.com/index_api/cgu?api_key=*******
For Legal mentions, you need use : https://api.jetsetrdv.com/index_api/informations?api_key=******.
For Ethics Charter, you need use : https://api.jetsetrdv.com/index_api/charte_ethique?api_key=******.
For Notice on Information Technologies and Freedoms, you need use : https://api.jetsetrdv.com/index_api/mentions_infos_libertes?api_key=******.

6) Print of configuration Arrays:
To print the arrays of configuration (like for sample the array "CHEVEUX" which contains the different colors of hair), you need use an URL like that :
https://api.jetsetrdv.com/index_api/array/get/SEXE?api_key=******
https://api.jetsetrdv.com/index_api/array/get/CHEVEUX?api_key=******

get.summary: Returns the table of variables of the parameter passed in the url
get.description:
This function returns the data presented in configuration tables which have the index corresponding of the parameter passed in the url.

You can replace "SEXE" by one of this array name :
- SEXE : Gender of the person
- SEXE2 : Sexuel preferences (ex : hetero)
- POUR : Type of dating user is looking for (ex: friend dating)
- YEUX : Eyes color
- CHEVEUX : Hair color
- SITUATION : Marital status (ex : Single)
- FUMEUR : Smoker or not smoker (ex: occasional smoker, not smoker...)
- ALLURE : Clothing style (ex : punk)
- HORAIRES : Availiability hours (ex : In the morning)
- SILHOUETTE : Body morthology (ex : thin)
- PERSONNALITE : Caracter (ex : Dynamic)
- MOIS : List of months of the year
- JOURS : List of days of the year
- FORMULE : Plan of subscription (ex : discovery, freedom)
- MOODS : Smileys
- ETUDES : Education level
- TRAVAIL : Job
- ZONE : Geographical zone
- ZONE2CITY : blabla
- AGE_RANGE : age group user is looking for classified by id (ex : id 3 => de 18 à 25 ans, from 18 till 25 years)
- MEET_FOR : type of meeting user is looking for (ex: take a cup of coffee)
- OPTIONS_BODY : psysical feature classified by id (ex : 1 => Piercing, 2 => Tattoo)
- OFTEN_SEXE : frequence of having sex classified by id (ex : 1 => 2 or 3 times per day)
- user_interests : sexual practices (ex : Sex hard)
- gifts : table of the gifts with id of the gift as a key and the cost of the gift as a value (ex : 1 => array('credit' => 5))

200.description:
An array to know if the user is well connected. This array contain the session ID you'll need on the other functions.

 If you need to login one user and redirict him to another domain

200.description:
Confirm if the subscription worked or not. This array contain the session ID you'll need on the other functions.

 If you need to redirict the user to another domain (keeping his
session) and print the Confirmation page, you can use this redirection's url : https://DOMAIN_TO_REDIRECT/Confirmation.html?get_session=SESSION_ID_YOU_GET .

 Please take care : if you are working on a fast registration Form (so you sent the param fast-part=1 to this funciton), you need to redirect the user to a different Confirmation page ==> https://DOMAIN_TO_REDIRECT/Confirmation_eclair.html?get_session=SESSION_ID_YOU_GET

If "from_my_flash" not sended, this function will return a list of 9 members included one who has flashed ont the connected user. (Empty list means nobody flashed on the player).

- "set_dislike" : when the user dislike someone [ please send the id_user of the profile who was disliked ]

post.description: Get informations about subscription or buying credit Gift

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: user session ID returned by function "login".

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: To force the version of the theme. Default version number is : 2

parameters.name: is_gift
parameters.description: Please send 1 if the user want buy some credit gift and not take a subscription.

200.description:
Return the Url of the payment page. So you need to print this web page in a new tab or in a web view.

About the payment confirmation :
 (a) If you are developping a web application, the user will be redirect to this page : https://YOUR-DOMAIN/index.php?mod=abo&result=CONFIRM where YOUR-DOMAIN is the domain of your web site and CONFIRM can be "ok" or "ko". 
 (b) If you are developping a mobile application, you need analyse the redirection : when, this page is redirected on the API domain (api.jetsetrdv.com in this sample), you need to call "Subscription confirmation" to know if the abonement is valid or not.

 In both case, the abonement will be automatically saved in the database, but this can take a few minutes. So, if abo is ok, you need to keep this information 15 minutes.

post.summary: Verify if the subscription is valid

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: user session ID returned by function "login".

parameters.name: abo_id
parameters.description: id of the subs type ( ex : 45 ), you have to send this id to receive informations about the user subscription because without this abo_id params, this function just send you if the user has a subscription without any other informations

200.description:
Return result="OK" if the subscription is accepted.
WARNING : This function need to be call ONLY 15 minutes after "Subscription" call ! To know if an user can tchat, you need to call "user" function !

album_share.description:
Used for album share. 7 possible values:
  'ask_sent' => signal that the request of share is sent (display on the applicant side)
  'ask_opened' => signal that a request is waiting (display on the owner side)
  'ask_closed' => signal that the request is processed (display on the owner side)
  'ask_accepted' => signal that request is accepted (display on applicant side)
  'accept_sent' => signal the sending of acceptance (display on owner side)
  'ask_refused' => signal that request is refused (display on applicant side)
  'refus_sent' => signal the sending of refusal (display on owner side)

result.description:
return the json object with pubs informations or null if there are errors.

 There are 3 sorts of pub that you have to treat :
  'header' ( under the header section, position fixed ),
  'Bottom' ( On the footer of the chat page under the sending button ),
  'Profil' ( On the menu, above 'logout' ).

 The informations on publicities are returned in a json format.
  {'bottom':{'204':{'script':' /a>', 'sexe_visible':'0', 'horaires_visibilite':'', 'inscrit_abo':'0', 'plateforme':'0'} , … }}

 Explanations :
  First we have the pub type (in that case bottom)
  After we have the id pub.
  Script : the script code of the publicity
  Sexe_visibility : the gender authorized to see the pub ( 0 or 12 = all, 1 = Male, 2 = Female ).
  Horaires_visibilite : not used.
  Inscrit_abo : ( 0 or 12 = registered and subscriber, 1 = registered, 2 = subscriber )
  Plateforme : device type ( 0 = all, 1 = computer, 2 = mobile ).
